page.title: 20GENERAL CHANGES IN FORFAR
page.content: {Converted buildings.} We no longer have a railway station, gasworks or slaughterhouse.The building which contained the original Police Station and Fire Station has been converted and is now used as the Brownie & Girl Guide HQ.The old 'spootie school'has been demolished and the Burgh Yard is there now. {CHAPELPARK SCHOOL DOMESDAY GROUP {Primary 7B & 12 Pupils of 5A & 5B} F.Massie,R.Leel,L.Adamson,J.Adamson J.Matthew,K.McIntyre,D.Balfour,J.Ip D.Morrison,R.Taylor,G.Balfour,S.Smith D.Miller,B.Callan,S.Stewart,E.Douglas O.Davidson,B.Wilson,G.Gillies,L.Law A.Duncan,E.Findlay,K.Tasker,J.Kydd, D.Fletcher,C.Greenhill,L.Hutcheon, S.Humphris,D.Laing,K.McDowell,P.Watt, G.Beattie,D.Macari,N.Reid,D.Robertson, P.Stables,S.Torfs,P.Welsh,J.Whyte, E.MacSporran.
